opinion:
544 U.S. 1058

JOHANNS, SECRETARY OF AGRICULTURE, ET AL.
v.
COCHRAN ET UX.

No. 04-446.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 31, 2005.

1

C. A. 3d Cir. Reported below: 359 F. 3d 263. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of Johanns v. Livestock Marketing Assn., ante, p. 550.
